com.intel.fightclub.ui.utils

Class DebugUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intel.fightclub.ui.utils.DebugUtil

  • @ThreadSafe
public final class DebugUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for the UI lib that provides convenience methods for file operations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.io.File getArdaStateDbFile(android.content.Context context)
      Returns a File object corresponding to an absolute path to the file in which the ARDA state file will be saved to.
      static java.io.File getDatabaseSavePath(android.content.Context context)
      Returns a File object corresponding to an absolute path to the file in which the sqlite3 database will be saved to.
      static java.io.File getDebugDirectory(android.content.Context context)
      Returns the directory with respect to the application's external storage where debug files are stored.
      static void jumpToOobe(android.app.Activity activity)
      Clears some preferences and jumps to first screen after login and profile creation.

    • Method Detail

      • getDebugDirectory

        @Slow(value=MILLISECONDS)
 @CheckResult
 @Nullable
public static java.io.File getDebugDirectory(@NonNull
                                                                                                android.content.Context context)
        Returns the directory with respect to the application's external storage where debug files are stored.
        Parameters:
        context - The Android application context.
        Returns:
        A File object pointing to the debug directory or null if it was unable to be created.

      • getDatabaseSavePath

        @Slow(value=MILLISECONDS)
 @CheckResult
 @Nullable
public static java.io.File getDatabaseSavePath(@NonNull
                                                                                                  android.content.Context context)
        Returns a File object corresponding to an absolute path to the file in which the sqlite3 database will be saved to. This path includes the timestamped file name.
        Parameters:
        context - The Android application context.
        Returns:
        A File object representing the absolute path to the file where the sqlite3 database should be saved to.

      • getArdaStateDbFile

        @Slow(value=MILLISECONDS)
 @CheckResult
 @Nullable
public static java.io.File getArdaStateDbFile(@NonNull
                                                                                                 android.content.Context context)
        Returns a File object corresponding to an absolute path to the file in which the ARDA state file will be saved to. This path includes the timestamped file name.
        Parameters:
        context - The Android application context.
        Returns:
        A File object representing the absolute path to the file where the arda state file should be saved to.

      • jumpToOobe

        public static void jumpToOobe(android.app.Activity activity)
        Clears some preferences and jumps to first screen after login and profile creation. Useful for testing if you don't want to clear all the data but you want to test some specific screens of the app.
        Parameters:
        activity - context
